title: Destined: The Fey Priestess Becomes The Bride Of Suzaku
alternative_title: Tsugai no Yomeiri - Giyou no Miko wa Suzaku no Toushu ni Aisareru Destined: The Fey Priestess Becomes the Bride of Suzaku; Tsugai no Yomeiri; つがいの嫁入り; つがいの嫁入り ～異形の巫女は朱雀の当主に愛される～; Destined: The Fey Priestess Of Suzuka
status: Tsugai no Yomeiri - Giyou no Miko wa Suzaku no Toushu ni Aisareru Destined: The Fey Priestess Becomes the Bride of Suzaku; Tsugai no Yomeiri; つがいの嫁入り; つがいの嫁入り ～異形の巫女は朱雀の当主に愛される～; Destined: The Fey Priestess Of Suzuka
description:
Description :
        In the snowy village of Rokka, the members of the Suzaku imperial family are revered as the descendants of Suzaku, the fire deity himself. Marrying the head of the Suzaku family...is considered the greatest of honors.Ginka Sakaeda comes from a line of shrine maidens. Her parents had hopes that she would marry into the Suzaku family one day. However, when she came into the world "deformed," they deemed her unworthy as the future Bride of Suzaku, and began treating her with hostility. Her younger sister Akane, however, was born with excellent grace and beauty, earning her the favor of the entire village and securing her position as the top candidate to marry into the Suzaku family. Then, on the eve of the ceremony that would decide Akane's future, Ginka has an unexpected encounter with the Suzaku family head. And the moment their hands touch...the two feel a warm sensation instantly course throughout their bodies!
